changeSet.author: srb55
changeSet.comment: Conversion on cap asset tab on FP docs
changeSet.sql: delete from fp_cptl_ast_info_dtl_t t1 where t1.campus_cd is null or (t1.fdoc_nbr = (select t.fdoc_nbr from fp_cptl_ast_info_t t, cynergyup.krew_doc_hdr_t t2 where t.cptlast_desc is null and t.cptlast_nbr is null and t.cptlast_typ_cd is null and t.cptlast_mfr_nm is null and t.cptlast_mfrmdl_nbr is null and t.vndr_dtl_asnd_id is null and t.vndr_hdr_gnrtd_id is null and t.fdoc_nbr = t1.fdoc_nbr and t2.doc_hdr_id= t1.fdoc_nbr and t2.DOC_HDR_STAT_CD in('X','I' ))) / commit / delete from fp_cptl_ast_info_dtl_t t1 where t1.campus_cd is null or (t1.fdoc_nbr = (select t.fdoc_nbr from fp_cptl_ast_info_t t, cynergyup.krew_doc_hdr_t t2 where t.cptlast_desc is null and t.cptlast_nbr is null and t.cptlast_typ_cd is null and t.cptlast_mfr_nm is null and t.cptlast_mfrmdl_nbr is null and t.vndr_dtl_asnd_id is null and t.vndr_hdr_gnrtd_id is null and t.fdoc_nbr = t1.fdoc_nbr and t2.doc_hdr_id= t1.fdoc_nbr and t2.DOC_HDR_STAT_CD in('X','I' ))) / commit /

changeSet.sql: alter table FP_CPTL_AST_INFO_DTL_EXT_T add CPTLAST_LINE_NBR NUMBER(7,0) default 1 not null / alter table FP_CPTL_AST_INFO_DTL_EXT_T drop constraint "FP_CPTL_AST_INFO_DTL_EXT_TP1" CASCADE / drop index FP_CPTL_AST_INFO_DTL_EXT_TP1 / alter table FP_CPTL_AST_INFO_DTL_EXT_T add CONSTRAINT "FP_CPTL_AST_INFO_DTL_EXT_TP1" PRIMARY KEY ("FDOC_NBR", "CPTLAST_LINE_NBR", "ITM_LN_NBR") /
